detaileddescription.para: For more info see the Visitor design pattern.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the identifier of the editable range.
Represents an end of an editable range in a Word document.

detaileddescription.para: A complete editable range in a Word document consists of a EditableRangeStart and a matching EditableRangeEnd with the same Id.
EditableRangeStart and EditableRangeEnd are just markers inside a document that specify where the editable range starts and ends.
Use the EditableRange class as a "facade" to work with an editable range as a single object.
